resources.string:
2.0.0.212:
  • Better handling of folders with large number of files.
  • Fixed bugs
2.0.0.211:
  • Added an option to use temp files instead of pipes even for read-only access.
  • Added additional parameters to container opening and closing intents (see FAQ).
  • Added numeric sorting mode to the file manager.
  • The full version of EDS now has an option to unlock a container using fingerprints.
  • The full version of EDS now supports opening a LUKS container using a keyfile.
  • Fixed bugs
2.0.0.206:
  • "last modified" timestamp of a file is restored after a copy/move operation.
  • Improved file manager: previously opened folder and scroll position are restored when switching between the containers and/or memory cards
  • Fixed: password dialog freezes on some systems.
  • Fixed: in some cases the remembered password is not working
  • Other minor fixes
2.0.0.202:
  • Added an option to install additional file system modules. Currently ExFAT module is supported which allows to open containers with ExFAT file system.
2.0.0:
  • EDS Lite is now on GitHub!
  • New UI. Please make yourself familiar with the new UI by watching a few videos.
  • Android 8 support
  • Added VeraCrypt support
  • Added LUKS support
  • Added EncFs support
  • More encryption algorithms supported
  • Improved image viewer.
  • You can download the previous version using this link
This is the open source version of EDS. Please support the development of the open source version by purchasing the full version or by making a donation.
